instruction: Write a CSound instrument that demonstrates VCO pulse generators
output:
<CsoundSynthesizer>
<CsOptions>
-odac
</CsOptions>
<CsInstruments>

sr = 44100
kr = 4410
ksmps = 10
nchnls = 2
0dbfs = 1

instr 1
    ; vco opcode: ares vco xamp, xcps, iwave, kpw [, ifn] [, imaxd] [, ileak] [, inyx] [, iphs] [, iskip]
    ; vco generates voltage-controlled oscillator waveforms
    ; xamp - amplitude
    ; xcps - frequency
    ; iwave - waveform type (1=saw, 2=square/PWM, 3=saw+square)
    ; kpw - pulse width (for square wave)
    
    iAmp = 0.4
    iFreq = p4
    iWave = 1  ; Sawtooth
    kPW = 0.5
    
    aVCO vco iAmp, iFreq, iWave, kPW
    
    outs aVCO, aVCO
endin

instr 2
    ; Square wave with PWM
    iAmp = 0.4
    iFreq = p4
    iWave = 2  ; Square wave
    
    ; Pulse width modulation
    kPW lfo 0.4, 0.5, 0
    kPW = 0.5 + kPW
    
    aVCO vco iAmp, iFreq, iWave, kPW
    
    outs aVCO, aVCO
endin

instr 3
    ; vco2 opcode: ares vco2 kamp, kcps [, imode] [, kpw] [, kphs] [, inyx]
    ; vco2 is improved VCO with more waveforms
    ; imode - waveform (0=saw, 2=square, 4=triangle, 10=PWM, 12=user waveform)
    ; kpw - pulse width
    
    iAmp = 0.4
    iFreq = p4
    iMode = 0  ; Sawtooth
    kPW = 0.5
    
    aVCO vco2 iAmp, iFreq, iMode, kPW
    
    outs aVCO, aVCO
endin

instr 4
    ; vco2 triangle wave
    iAmp = 0.5
    iFreq = p4
    iMode = 4  ; Triangle
    
    aVCO vco2 iAmp, iFreq, iMode
    
    outs aVCO, aVCO
endin

instr 5
    ; vco2 PWM square
    iAmp = 0.4
    iFreq = p4
    iMode = 10  ; PWM mode
    
    ; Modulating pulse width
    kPW lfo 0.45, 0.3, 0
    kPW = 0.5 + kPW
    kPW limit kPW, 0.05, 0.95
    
    aVCO vco2 iAmp, iFreq, iMode, kPW
    
    outs aVCO, aVCO
endin

instr 6
    ; squinewave opcode: aout squinewave acps, aClip, askew [, iMinSweep, imaxSweep]
    ; squinewave generates sine-square morph waveform
    ; acps - frequency
    ; aClip - clipping amount (0=sine, 1=square)
    ; askew - symmetry skew
    
    iAmp = 0.4
    iFreq = p4
    
    aFreq = iFreq
    
    ; Morph from sine to square
    kClip linseg 0, p3, 1
    aClip = kClip
    
    aSkew = 0
    
    aSquine squinewave aFreq, aClip, aSkew
    
    outs aSquine*iAmp, aSquine*iAmp
endin

instr 7
    ; vco2ift and vco2init
    ; vco2ift creates tables for vco2
    ; vco2init initializes vco2 tables
    
    iAmp = 0.4
    iFreq = p4
    iMode = 2  ; Square wave
    
    aVCO vco2 iAmp, iFreq, iMode
    
    outs aVCO, aVCO
endin

</CsInstruments>
<CsScore>

; Play vco sawtooth
i1 0 2 220
i1 2.5 2 330

; Play vco PWM
i2 5.5 3 440

; Play vco2 sawtooth
i3 9.5 2 294

; Play vco2 triangle
i4 12.5 2 392

; Play vco2 PWM
i5 15.5 3 523

; Play squinewave morph
i6 19.5 4 330

; Play vco2 square
i7 24.5 2 440

e
</CsScore>
</CsoundSynthesizer>
